title: Mobile-optimized layout for Approved Users rows (alignment/spacing only)

requirements.text: Update the Admin Dashboard "Approved Users" section rows to use a mobile-optimized layout that fixes button alignment/spacing on small screens without changing any button behavior (same actions, same labels, same enabled/disabled logic).

quotes:
1. different mobile-optimezed design
2. Only this section, the rest does look fine.
3. Only alignment/spacing

acceptanceCriteria: Only the "Approved Users" section UI is changed; "Pending Approvals", reset section, and other pages remain visually/functionally unchanged.
On small/mobile widths, each ApprovedUserRow no longer overflows horizontally and no buttons are clipped off-screen.
On small/mobile widths, the ApprovedUserRow layout is stacked (content area and actions arranged to fit narrow screens) with consistent spacing and alignment (no overlapping elements).
The action buttons in ApprovedUserRow (Make/Remove Admin and Remove) remain fully usable and trigger the same callbacks as before; no new confirmation flows or behavior changes are introduced.
On tablet/desktop widths, the ApprovedUserRow retains an appropriate horizontal layout similar to the current design (no regression).
Implementation is done by editing the ApprovedUserRow markup/classes in frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx (responsive Tailwind classes preferred).

constraints: Do not change button behavior or backend logic; alignment/spacing and responsive layout only.
Limit changes to the "Approved Users" section; the rest of the app UI should remain as-is.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
nonGoals: Redesigning the entire mobile UI outside the Approved Users section.
Changing role/approval logic, backend APIs, or persistence.
Replacing buttons with icon-only controls or altering button text/actions.
